Q.8. FOR MEN IN YOUR CLASS OF LIMITED ASSIGNMENT, HOW LONG IS IT FROM THE TIME THEY ARE PUT ON LIMITED ASSIGNMENT BEFORE THEY ARE EXAMINED AGAIN BY A MEDICAL BOARD*    1. 3 TO 6 MONTHS 7 2. 6 MONTHS TO 1 YEAR 0 3. 1 TO 2 YEARS   4. IN MY CLASS THEY ARE NOT EXAMINED AGAIN   5. DON,T KNOW HOW LONG IT IS   0. NO ANSWER

Q.11. DO YOU THINK THAT MOST LIMITED ASSIGNMENT REINFORCEMENTS ARE ASSIGNED TO AN ARMY JOB FOR WHICH THEY ARE WELL SUITED*    1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM ARE   2. MOST OF THEM ARE   3. ALMOST HALF OF THEM ARE   4. MOST OF THEM ARE NOT   5. ALMOST ALL OF THEM ARE NOT   0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION   NOT CODED.

Q.13. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE BEEN TOLD AS MUCH AS IT IS POSSIBLE TO TELL YOU ABOUT WHAT TYPE OF JOB YOU ARE GOING TO BE ASSIGNED TO*    1. YES, THEY HAVE TOLD US ABOUT AS MUCH AS THEY CAN   2. NO, THEY COULD HAVE TOLD US A LOT MORE   3. NO ANSWER 1 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.14. DO YOU THINK IT IS NECESSARY TO PUT LIMITED ASSIGNMENT MEN IN REAR ECHELON JOBS IN THE ETO OR SHOULD THEY BE SENT BACK TO THE U.S.*    1. IT IS NECESSARY TO PUT THEM ON JOBS HERE   2. THEY SHOULD BE SENT BACK TO THE U.S.   0. NO ANSWER
